head.title: Remove {{FileFormatUp}} pages in {{EnvName}} apps
head.description: Use {{ProdFullName}} to reorder pages in {{FileFormatUp}} documents effortlessly. Process PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, images, and more with ease.

header.title: Move pages in {{FileFormatUp}}
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} empowers {{EnvNameShort}} applications to reorder pages in {{FileFormatUp}} documents seamlessly.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: {{ProdShortName}} Info
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a powerful document processing tool that supports over 50 file formats, including PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, images, and archives. It offers essential features like merging, splitting, extracting, moving, swapping, and removing pages.

more_features.title: Efficient document processing
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} is designed to provide a comprehensive set of features, enabling you to process over 50 widely used business file formats for your needs.

feature_1.title: Combine documents in various formats
feature_1.content: Merge content from files like PDFs, Word documents, presentations, spreadsheets, images, archives, and more. Use flexible options to achieve precise results.

feature_2.title: Page manipulations
feature_2.content: Reposition pages within documents. Move, swap, or remove pages to manage your business document content effectively.

feature_3.title: Adjust page appearance
feature_3.content: Rotate pages to any angle or switch their orientation between landscape and portrait.

feature_4.title: Extract pages into separate files
feature_4.content: Extract one or more pages and save them as standalone documents.

formats.title: Reorder document pages in multiple formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports over 50 file formats, enabling efficient and flexible document manipulation.

operations.title: Main features
operations.description: Discover other popular capabilities of our solution.

examples.comment_2: Provide number of the page that is supposed to be removed

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is able to delete {{FileFormatUp}} document pages easily. {{EnvName}} applications may be powered by our solution in order to provide document management features.
content.step_2: Set the options with numbers of pages to be deleted.

code_1.title: Be informed how to remove all even pages
code_1.content: Learn how to remove even pages in a {{FileFormatUp}} document.
code_1.comment_1: Pass file path to the constructor
code_1.comment_2: Get the number of the last page
code_1.comment_3: Set up options to remove all even pages
code_1.comment_5: Save the result to specified location
